Description:
***CANCELLED - OPEN FOR INSPECTION - SATURDAY 2nd NOVEMBER - CANCELLED***
Situated in the heart of Emerald this great four bedroom home is perfect for those looking at moving from a large property to a central location without sacrificing on house size. Also ideally suited to young families who need to be able to walk to the Primary School, parks, shops and the kindergarten that is right across the road, this is a property that will make your life easier. A flat, fully fenced block with sealed driveway and colourful landscaped gardens surrounds this light filled brick home. There is a double remote garage under roofline with a rear roller door that allows access through to a separate Colorbond garage that has power and concrete floor. The design of the home offers zoned bedrooms and living areas making for easy living whatever the size of your family. The master bedroom is serviced by a full ensuite and walk in robe and the remaining bedrooms have their own section and are serviced by the family bathroom. Two spacious living areas at either end of the home provide for relaxed living and the central kitchen with loads of bench space and cupboards, dishwasher, wall oven and hotplates has a large tiled meals area adjoining with a sliding door out to the covered outdoor area. Gas ducted heating, split system and shade blinds ensure year round comfort. Walk to any of our highly regarded eateries and relax with a latte, wander down to the park and wave to Puffing Billy or get involved in the nearby Art Society or Gemco theatre. If you have been waiting for the ideal home in a central location, this is the home for you.
Insights: 2 Kings Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
EMERALD'S GREEN GEM
Attractively nestled within its own quiet verdant setting, and surrounded by a beautifully maintained and vibrant garden, you will find this impressive Gem.
Functional floorplan offering two bedrooms, master bedroom features Walk in Robe, Powder room and magnificent views. Second bedroom is extra-large, with plenty of room for a study desk, bunks or similar.
A family friendly, and very inviting Kitchen with all the wanted appliances and walk in pantry, is off the Family /meals area.
A large dining/ family room, with an al fresco design is located off the kitchen area, or step down to the family/Rumpus room, with wood fire and Flagstone flooring.
A classic step down lounge room, with decorative fireplace and period features completes the home.
Other features include:
• undercover pergola
• mains water and gas
• Large 940 m2 block (approx)
• woodshed
• garden water tanks
• Undercover car accommodation for 5 cars
• close to puffing Billy and thousand steps
There are so many features that an inspection is a must. Check for open times and dates, or call me now to arrange a private inspection. You will not be disappointed. Prior offers are invited.
Commercial Real Estate Group – Setting the standards others follow!
Insights: 21 Ladd Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Designed to be Unique in a Premier Location!
Stand out from the crowd with this architecturally designed home which sits proudly amongst the colourful canopy of stunning trees that surround. If privacy appeals to you then you will absolutely love the peaceful view this home enjoys from every angle. Step inside & instantly feel at home with clean lines, modern appeal & 3 spacious living zones. The relaxed atmosphere is enhanced throughout with polished timber floors, timber kitchen, large expanses of glass and high ceilings. Comfort is assured with gas & wood heating, 2 spilt system heating and cooling units, plus there are many opening doors that lead to the private balconies where you will find yourself feeling at one with nature. Set on approx. 1673m2 of usable space complete with storage shedding or outdoor studio should you decide to get creative. All this is located within walking distance to the shops, school & transport - we dare you to find better!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
YOUR COUNTRY ESCAPE ON 1 FLAT ACRE = SPACE FOR CHILDREN, PETS, TOYS AND YOU!
This wonderful country property offers the space and fresh air you crave and the lifestyle that you and your family need. Designed to provide for the needs of the whole family, you can make the most of a spacious 5 bedroom home featuring the beauty of rich timber floors, raked ceilings and huge windows. There are two big living areas, and a central kitchen complete with 900mm stove and dishwasher that adjoins the large family room. You will enjoy settling back in front of the crackling solid fuel fire and watching your favourite movie in the living room or entertaining in the dining area and relaxed living in the family room. Gas ducted heating provides warmth at the flick of a switch and a heat exchange vent from the wood fire will help with heating costs. The fully fenced one acre block has plenty of vehicle accommodation with an over height four car carport plus a huge garage/workshop complete with three phase power that would ideally suit a tradesperson or handyman. The sealed, circular driveway provides easy access and caters for an abundance of vehicles. Celebrating Christmas, special occasions and Grand Final day will be a delight as you share a barbeque with family and friends under the shady verandahs or the covered outdoor entertainment area while the kids play footy or cricket in the huge yard or splash around in the solar heated plunge pool. For those wanting a self-sufficient lifestyle there is a chicken pen and plenty of room for veggies as well as established gardens. With easy access to Gembrook Township and Pakenham you can choose from a variety of highly regarded schools and have easy access to all services.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 9 Stone Road South, Gembrook VIC 3783 was last sold in 2019 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Gembrook have recently been sold.

Description:
INVEST, DEVELOP OR START OUT!!
Set on a flat allotment of 953m2 this property is zoned Neighbourhood Residential 1 and offers the astute buyer a chance to get into the market with this spacious, centrally located 2-bedroom home with great future development potential.
With two separate living areas and two good sized bedrooms, this neat and tidy home also offers a lock up garage and a separate shed.
A short stroll away is Gembrook township where you can enjoy all the facilities including shops, Primary school, cafes and public transport is right out the front.
Perhaps youd like a flat block of land to build your eventual dream home the options are endless! (Subject to council approval).
The quiet township of Gembrook at the terminus of Puffing Billy Railway is located only approximately 15 minutes drive to Emerald and Pakenham and offers the quiet country lifestyle youve been looking for, yet great convenience too.
If you are looking for an investment, the property is currently tenanted on a month to month lease.
Call Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 or Amy Fairway on 0409 336 420 to arrange your inspection now as this home wont last!

Description:
Prime Location!
Set on a generous quarter acre block (1011m2 approx.) in the leafy little town of Gembrook, this classic, cottage-style 3 bedroom home is the perfect new start for you and your family.
The much-loved family home is immaculately presented with the master bedroom offering a walk-through robe and semi-ensuite with a separate toilet, whilst the remaining 2 bedrooms have built in robes. The beautiful kitchen, which boasts a dishwasher, gas stove top and pantry, looks over the gorgeous open plan living/ dining area, with a warmly welcoming gas log open fireplace. Year-round comfort throughout the home is assured, courtesy of ducted heating and air conditioning.
From the open plan living area you step onto a huge undercover decking, perfect for entertaining your friends and family. From the spacious study nook you can walk onto the second decking to soak up the sun, while enjoying the privacy of surrounding hedges. The front garden features extensive brick paving and established garden beds, with a well-kept front hedge. The spacious back yard is a great size for the kids & pets to enjoy with landscaped gardens, mature trees, brick paved area and a variety of fruit trees including grapefruit, lemon, lime, nectarine and orange. There is also double sided access, a powered 4.8 x 7.2 metre garage, garden shed with veggie patch, 5000 litre water tank and solar power.
Set in an absolutely prime location, within close walking distance to the post office, supermarket, numerous cafes & restaurants, primary school, pre-school & bus stop. So much to love with so little to do, get down here and fall in love with this property before someone else does!

Description:
***CANCELLED - Open For Inspection - Saturday 13th July - CANCELLED***
Established by the current owners 30 years ago this incredible property offers everything the serious equestrian enthusiast could ask for as well as a custom built Lucas & Morris home on 12.21 ha of stunning established gardens, pasture and waterways. The property has been running as a renowned Stud Farm and therefore offers excellent fencing including electric fencing, a laneway to the paddocks allowing easy access, four spring fed dams, holding yard, lunging arena, floodlit stable complex with 2 birthing stables and two additional oversized stables suitable for the larger breeds of horses plus three additional stables complete with separate tack room, feed room, wash bay, float cover and 14x7.3 machinery shed. The perfectly presented home has been situated to take advantage of the park like setting with all living areas overlooking the pool, established ornamental gardens and on to rolling pastures and shade trees. Big living areas span the full length of the home and include a lounge and dining room with central fireplace, family/meals area, separate rumpus room with wet bar and a huge, 4th living area that is currently used as a work from home space but could also be used as a childrens play room or theatre room. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboards and bench space, 1 ½ ovens, hotplates and dishwasher and will be a delight to work in. There are four bedrooms, the master is serviced by a walk in robe and ensuite that overlooks a lush fernery whilst the remaining bedrooms are serviced by the family bathroom complete with a bath. Luxury extras include internal access from the double garage, split system heating and cooling and soaring ceilings with clerestory windows that adds loads of light and add dramatic appeal. The in-ground pool nestles beautifully into its lush surrounds and ensures that this is a property that has been designed to cater to your every need. Offered for sale for the first time in 30 years, rarely does such a magnificent property become available, arrange your inspection today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
PEACEFUL, PRIVATE, MODERN, STUDIO, LARGE SHED EMERALDS BEST KEPT SECRET!
***OPEN CANCELLED - CONTACT AGENT***
If you are looking for a quiet, tranquil home to come back to after a busy day, this home may just be the one for you. Set on just over half an acre of land opposite the Cardinia Reservoir reserve, you will love the peace and quiet, yet only a short distance to Emerald facilities including Schools, cafes, shops and supermarkets.
Beautifully renovated the main home offers 3 bedrooms and one fully renovated bathroom with detached studio with ensuite offering the option of a 4th bedroom or work from home setup. The interior of the home is set up well for growing families with separate lounge, family and dining areas with the updated kitchen with dishwasher operating as the hub of the home. Warmer weather entertaining is a breeze on the large deck from which you enjoy views to the bushland and wildlife over the road.
For the tradies or those that have a lot of stuff, youll be impressed with the parking and car accommodation with double carport plus 4 car garage and ample off-street parking. The kids are well catered for too with a great cubby house and sand pit plus plenty of grassy area to run around on too. Creature comforts include evaporative cooling, gas ducted heating and wood heater. Private and peaceful this home is also modern, spacious and flexible so come and see how your family can settle here and enjoy this lifestyle - but youd better be quick, homes like this dont last long! Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Walk to Town, Bright and Sunny Position
*** OPEN HOME CANCELLED***
This low maintenance 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom, brick veneer home with double carport is in such a convenient location you will be able to take advantage of all the great cafes in Emerald Township, the sporting clubs and schools. Youll love the sunny aspect of this ¼ acre fenced allotment and the rear deck is sure to be a Spring/Summer favourite. The family friendly layout offers main with WTR and ensuite, the remaining bedrooms serviced by the family bathroom and separate WC, a large living room, dining area adjoining the kitchen with stainless steel gas hotplates including wok burner, wall oven and a dishwasher. This lovely home boasts timber floors, large windows and fabulous under house storage, ducted heating and split system cooling and solar.
If convenience, low maintenance and a great floorplan is on your wish list, best put 10 Durban Road in Emerald on top of your list. To arrange a viewing or if you have any questions call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Amy Fairway 0409 336 420 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432.

Description:
5 Tranquil Acres Close to Gembrook!
What an opportunity - 5 acres filled with majestic towering gums and tree ferns. This block is well positioned to provide a quiet tranquil retreat yet, conveniently, is only minutes from Gembrook.
The circular gravelled driveway with a sturdy sleeper retaining wall, brings you to the quaint rustic home/weekender. The home features a bedroom, living room, open plan country style kitchen and a large bathroom/laundry. The wood fire heater is perfectly positioned to maintain a cosy warmth in the cooler months while the split system will keep you cooler when the weather heat up.
Outside there is a 7 x 5m shed complete with concrete floor and plenty of room for parking. This peaceful and private property is the perfect place to stop and enjoy the chorus of birdsongs or just marvel at the abundance of native wildlife. Ideal as a weekender where you can unwind, recharge and get close to nature or develop as your dream home (STCA).
Conveniently located close to Kirth Kiln Regional Park and Gembrook township, this property will appeal to many buyers, so be quick to book your private inspection.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Harmonious Hills Living
Feel at peace with the world around as you gaze out onto the serene treetops in this contemporary, fully renovated two-storey Hills home.
A welcoming open plan living arrangement extends along the rear of the house encompassing a spacious modern kitchen, dining area and lounge. This comfortable space is drawn together by a beautiful natural hardwood flooring all invitingly warmed by a wood-heater, as well as ducted heating plus a split system. The floor to ceiling windows in the living area frame the best that nature has to offer and invite you outdoors on to the large entertaining deck, which is absolutely the place to be as the sun begins to set.
Upstairs you will also find the 3 spacious bedrooms. The pleasing master suite boasts a walk-in robe, private balcony and modish ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles tucked behind a rolling barn door, along with a stylish and practical main bathroom with a deep and luxurious bath.
Downstairs there is an enormous amount of space to play with in the grand games room, currently hosting a bar and billiards, with additional space in the bright study and a huge laundry.
The meandering native garden is full of tree ferns, palms and terraces inviting you to while away the days. It is fully fenced and houses three sheds and a two car carport.
Come along and see the light on the open day.

Description:
Charming Hills Cottage Ready To Call Your Own!
This charming neat 3 bedroom weatherboard home set on a 1/4 acre offers a big back yard for the kids & your 4 legged fur babies to play, as well as privacy from the rest of the world.
Featuring a large entry, spacious lounge, 3 generous sized bedrooms, well-appointed kitchen with dual drawer dishwasher, double pantry and adjoining meals area, this house is ready for you to call it home. For your climate comfort there is mains gas ducted heating throughout as well as the wood fire heater in the living area to keep you cosy and warm in the cooler months.
Outside in the backyard retreat is a spacious stand-alone studio providing a wonderful space for art/craft creations, kids retreat or home office. Other features include a fenced rear yard, garden shed, veggie patch, single carport and a gate opening to a small public playground conveniently located behind the property. Within easy walking distance of Emerald Lake Park via the walking tracks nearby, as well as the local store, Emerald Secondary College and public transport this is not only an affordable first home, but also a sensational investment opportunity.
At this price you cannot afford to wait. Call to arrange a private inspection today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Enchanted in The Woods
Set well back, at the end of a meandering sealed driveway with turning circle, stands an architecturally bespoke Merchant Builder original family home. Designed with a spirit of optimism and a desire to welcome the outside in.
Hot-off-the-press remodelling and renos seamlessly blends original features such as the parquetry flooring and timber-lined walls with the very best of modern styling for convenience and longevity. A mid-century home revitalised into a contemporary peace-filled sanctuary amongst the trees. With clean lines and light filled spaces, this 4 bed plus study home has views of greenery from every window.
At the heart of the home, the kitchen is love at first sight. You will fall for the stunning recycled messmate timber bench-tops and breakfast bar, brand new 900mm oven with cook-top, the soft close drawers and ample cupboard and storage space. Fills your heart and bellies!
Rainbow lorikeets, king parrots and kookaburras regularly perch at the window just outside the meals area, thrilling the kids and nature enthusiasts.
The peace is also palpable as you sit in the spacious light-filled lounge in front of the open fire-place. In true Merchant Builder style, the high ceilings, true lines and abundance of windows amplify the space in the home, and give a real feeling of serenity as nature is invited in.
All bedrooms have built-in robes, with a good-sized main bathroom and generous en-suite equipped with his and her vanity.
If you go down to meet Ms Woods today, be sure of a very pleasant surprise.
Also boasting
- polished concrete & new carpet flooring
- brand new hot water unit
- brand new heating unit
- spacious laundry
- Double car port
- storage shed
- cat run
- cellar/storage area

Description:
YOUR COUNTRY ESCAPE ON OVER 1 ACRE
All of the charm and beauty of a by gone era combines here with all of the modern conveniences to create a home that offers a warm and welcoming environment. Timber floors, high ceilings, picture rails and feature plasterwork add grace to the home and gas ducted heating, split system and solid fuel fire ensure year round comfort. There are four bedrooms, the spacious master has room for a king sized bed and is serviced by a walk in robe and ensuite; the remaining rooms are catered for by the family bathroom which comes complete with a claw foot bath and separate toilet. The country style kitchen features a large five burner stove, dishwasher and plenty of cupboards and has room for a huge table. There are double doors that lead from the kitchen/meals area to a huge living room that has doors out to the covered deck. This area is a wonderful place for large gatherings and has played host to a variety of birthday parties, Christmas functions and even a wedding! Café blinds help with climate control and the view of the rear yard is tranquil and serene. A second, separate living room is perfect as a quiet place to read and relax or perhaps watch a movie. Outdoors the yard is fenced into two areas providing a safe place for children and pets and the land goes down to Wattle creek where natures wonderland will provide a peaceful playground. There is a fenced chicken coup, American style 3 bay garage with mezzanine storage that is ideal as a man cave/workshop and an in/out driveway that is sealed down one side. All services are connected to this truly remarkable property. Make a move to the lifestyle you crave today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Start Building Your Dream Home (STCA)!
Perfectly located within an easy strolling distance to all that beautiful Gembrook has to offer - cafes, restaurants, shops, public transport, kindergarten, playgrounds, parklands and of course the iconic Puffing Billy station. Imagine the convenience of walking to the many cafes to meet friends for brunch, or walking with your kids to the many parklands and playgrounds - forget the car and enjoy the benefits of this great location for your new home.
This 1/3 acre block is north facing to capture the sun and lightly sloping with lovely country views - the ideal block to start building your dream home (STCA)!
Surrounded by new homes currently being built, there is a current planning permit for an architecturally designed 3 bedroom home for the block. There is even a permit to live onsite while the house is being built.
This is a great opportunity to secure a perfect parcel of land in a perfect location.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
PMARA KUTATA A PLACE OF BELONGING ON 2167m2
Perfectly presented and totally renovated, this stunning home is set high to make the most of its leafy surrounds and provides a view from every window. With Puffing Billy chugging along the rear of the property and natures wonderland including tall tree ferns as your backdrop, the tranquillity and beauty surrounding this property will allow you to relax and enjoy country living and inspire your artistic creativity. The Caesarstone kitchen features a Bosch pyrolytic oven and induction cook top, Asko dishwasher, soft close drawers, an island bench with double sided cupboards and drawers, wine fridge, glass splashback, filtered water tap and spray/flow tap and has a meals area where you can sit in front of the solid fuel fire with whatever youve whipped up on your State of the Art appliances. The bathroom boasts a 1mx1m shower, floor to ceiling tiles, bath and the latest tap ware. Raked ceilings and designer style create a most desirable home and large windows in the living area and a log fire gives the right atmosphere for every occasion. A separate studio/artists retreat will cater to those needing a quiet place to create and contemplate. Outdoor entertaining on the large deck will be a delight with a pond and colourful plantings as well as an abundance of native birds to delight in. Only a short walk from Wright State forest and the many trails to Emerald Lake or Gembrook, this meticulously maintained property will delight you.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
DAYDAWN 1600m2 IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Ready and waiting for you, this fabulous vacant land has a cleared site for your new home, is high set to provide a stunning outlook across the valley and has a sealed circular driveway to make building easier. With water, gas, electricity and NBN all available for connection, all you need to do is submit your plan for your country home to the council and watch your dream become reality. A variety of native birds including King Parrots and kookaburras frequent the landscaped gardens and will add to your enjoyment of your new property. Within walking distance of central Emerald where a variety of shops and eateries, renowned Primary School, kindergarten, childcare, medical, sporting facilities and our iconic Puffing Billy can be found, this opportunity to secure vacant land in our highly sought township is rare. Dont hesitate to make your move.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
WHY WE LOVE THE HILLS
On a private ½ acre, this family home is perfectly positioned to capture the sunlight to the north and showcase the distant views throughout the living and dining areas. You feel like youre on a much larger property with privacy and a green outlook out of every window. Once you step inside, you appreciate the warmth of the hardwood floors, charm of the timber work and quirky nooks throughout the home. The country chic style is accented by exposed Oregon timber beams and enhanced with the use of clever lighting.
With 5 bedrooms, walk-in robe and ensuite to main, 2 living zones plus a study nook, theres plenty of room for the whole family. The kitchen is the heart of the home, connecting the formal dining, casual meals and outdoor entertaining areas. The kitchen blends steel splashbacks, subway tiles, polished concrete floor, timber, stainless steel appliances and cabinets in an eccentric way that works. All the creature comforts are here, like gas ducted heating, 2 wood heaters, town gas, electric lift garage.
Outside, the huge covered outdoor entertaining area overlooks the open lawns and established gardens, which offer privacy from almost every angle. For those that like to tinker or have a bit of stuff, theres a workshop off the garage and plenty of storage areas.
Nearby, youll enjoy some of the best shops, schools and facilities in the hills. This home is located just 1.5klm from Emeralds bustling township,1klm to Emerald Secondary, 2klm to Emerald Primary and 4.3klm to Monbulk College.
When you think of all the reasons to love the hills, this home ticks those boxes.
Dont miss this opportunity for you and your family as a home with this much to offer doesnt come along every day. Contact Mat Fitch 0473363606 or Mick Dolphin 0429684522 to arrange your inspection now!

Description:
Mudbrick Cottage with Views - subdivision potential!
*** ACCESS VIA HEROES AVENUE***
With Puffing Billy chugging past and beautiful valley and mountain views beyond, this cosy mudbrick cottage has plenty of potential. In a quiet, peaceful and sunny location. With 2 street frontages and set on just over 1100 m2 allotment the zoning allows for subdivision (subject to council approval of course) - a great opportunity or nest egg for the future. Currently the home consists of an open plan beamed living and dining room, warmed by a gas log fire. Rear deck and side courtyard, a lovely sunny flat lawn area, perfect place to soak up the spring sunshine. Also 3 bedrooms, serviceable kitchen with upright stove, adjoining laundry, also separate WC and bathroom. Just a short stroll into town, the IGA, cafes and speciality shops, the bus stop and just minutes to the local primary school.
A great first home buyers project, bring your imagination, some tools and roll your sleeves up to create your own piece of mudbrick magic! Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to show you through.

Description:
A TRUE STATEMENT IN STYLE
Contemporary in design and with no expense spared, this home provides the turn-key solution you have spent your weekends searching for.
Featuring the highest quality finishes and stunning Blackbutt flooring throughout, this beautifully presented home boasts 4 bedrooms, the master with spacious walk-in robe and complimented by an ensuite that looks as though it is straight out of a magazine with custom built vanity, floor to ceiling tiles, black tapware and double shower. The remaining bedrooms all have built-in robes and are serviced by the equally stunning family bathroom, complete with deep, free standing bath. The study provides an excellent place to work from home, or the flexibility of a 5th bedroom should you require the extra space.
The kitchen is at the heart of the home and features waterfall Cesar stone benchtops, 900mm freestanding oven with 5 burner stove, an abundance of soft close storage, dishwasher, black sink & hardware, whilst overlooking the spacious open plan lounge and dining that is flooded with natural light from the large windows. With the added charm of an open fireplace, the second living area ensures everyone in the family has their own space to relax.
Comfort all year round is ensured with ducted heating and cooling throughout.
Entertaining is made a breeze as the covered decked area leads straight off the main living room through bi-fold doors, catering for the indoor-outdoor lifestyle youve always desired.
The allotment of 1300m2 approx. boasts flat lawn areas for the kids and animals to play, while the double garage with workshop and double carport will keep the tools and cars safe.
Surrounded by natural bushland, native wildlife and walking trails leading through Wrights Forrest and into Emerald Lake Park, you will be able to immerse yourself in the hills lifestyle from the day you move in. Only minutes from both Emerald and Cockatoo townships, quality schools and public transport, this is a package that is going to be highly sought, so call today to secure your inspection!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
